title: Metallica Songs
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

# Metallica Songs From Spotify

## Popularity and Song Features


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
By Spotify API

>Detailed song info for every Metallica song released/available on spotify. The remastered and box sets are included and may lead to duplicate songs during analysis.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
## Included Files

> 
- metallica_songs.csv: Detailed information on each song by Metallica including song features, popularity, release date, etc.

## Featured Notebooks & How To Use
> - [[Visualize Em' All](https://www.kaggle.com/code/jonbown/simpsons-views-with-r-sql)]

## Pipeline

>If you're interested in how this dataset is maintained and updated, please see this [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/jon-bown/metallica)

## Acknowledgements

> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit Spotify.
